data.actual_result: A new file picker window is created
data.expected_result: It should focus the file picker window already created
data.short_description: In the desktop client, you can click 'Upload Avatar' multiple times and it opens multiple upload windows
data.steps_to_repro: - Open user settings - Click 'Edit' under 'My Account' - Click 'Change Avatar' - Focus main discord window, click change avatar again
